content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0) with fuel (coal: 1) and currently working, producing copper plates.
- Furnace at position (63.0, -52.0) without fuel and currently not working, producing copper plates.
- Furnace at position (65.0, -52.0) with fuel (coal: 40) but currently not working due to lack of ingredients.

### Copper ore mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x1) and a furnace at position (y1).
- Burner mining drill at position (x2) and a furnace at position (y2).
- Burner mining drill at position (x3) and a furnace at position (y3).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace operations
- Check the fuel status of furnaces before attempting to insert materials. If a furnace is out of fuel, it will not operate.
- Ensure that there are sufficient ingredients available for the furnace to work. If there are no ingredients, the furnace will not operate.
